input.sentences: the dinner had a vintage feel .
he stayed at the hotel fontaine bleu .
output.sentences: Long ago, there was a boy who would enjoy dinner with his family and friends.
As he got older, he decided that he wanted to travel the world.
He would hike deep valleys and high mountain ranges.
There was much to be seen during his travels.
He finally decided that what he really wanted was the closeness of friends and family, settling down and opening a Hotel.
